data.name: banner1_giveyouropinion
data.value: Give your opinion and get paid

data.name: breach_terms_msg
data.value: If OpinionBar is of the reasonable opinion that a real or potential breach of the letter or intent of the terms and conditions has occurred, OpinionBar reserves the right to immediately either permanently or temporarily postpone or terminate the Services supplied by OpinionBar, to block prohibited activities or undertake any other actions it considers suitable. Users who violate these TERMS may also become criminally or civilly liable. OpinionBar may hand any perpetrators over to the civil or criminal authorities for prosecution and will co-operate fully with the authorities with regards to investigations into suspected civil or criminal offences.

data.name: content_msg
data.value: OpinionBar is not responsible for the contents parties (e.g. web sites, commercials, cookies, ads, tags, software) or products of third you visit as a participant of a survey, whether this is permitted by the laws for copyright, trade secrecy, slander, privacy, and obscenity or otherwise.</br> You understand that by becoming a Panel Member and sometimes taking part in surveys you may have to view contents that may be insulting or inappropriate or infringe the right of ownership of a third party. You are the only one responsible for making reasonable attempts to guard against unwanted material. Under no circumstance is OpinionBar responsible for the contents of anything viewed, mailed, or otherwise received as a result of your participation in a survey, whatever its origins.</br> OpinionBar can take action as OpinionBar if it finds this necessary and is of the opinion that it or its branches, suppliers, channel partners or clients may become responsible, including but not limited to the removal of content and/or immediate termination of your membership if your behaviour does not comply to the letter or the spirit of these terms and conditions.</br>

data.name: dec_privacy_msg
data.value: By accepting the TERMS you explicitly accept OpinionBar's publication and use of your personal details as described in the then current</br> OpinionBar Declaration of Privacy.

data.name: email_error_msg2
data.value: The Email Address field is required

data.name: expiry_ account_msg
data.value: If you do not actively take part in the OpinionBar Panel - if you do not respond to any email requests or take part in an available investigation - for a period of more than one month, OpinionBar has the right to close your account and any balance in your account will be considered "not earned " and will expire.</br> OpinionBar and the OpinionBar Logo are trademarks of MetrixLab B.V. in The Netherlands and worldwide. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

data.name: first_name_error_msg
data.value: The First name field is required

data.name: forgot_psw_msg
data.value: Please enter your e-mail address and we will send you an e-mail with a special link which you can use to enter a new password for your account.

data.name: general_msg
data.value: The TERMS are generated and drawn up in conformance with Dutch law as it applies to contracts entered into by Dutch inhabitants. If any condition(s) in the TERMS does/do not conform to the law, condition(s) will be drawn up that remain as close to the intentions of the parties as possible. The other provisions in this Agreement will remain fully applicable. If OpinionBar fails to execute or force the rights or provisions in the TERMS, this does not mean the TERMS have rejected such a right or provision, unless this has been acknowledged and approved in writing by OpinionBar. You and OpinionBar agree that a cause or action resulting from or with regards to these TERMS or the Services must be taken within one (1) year from when the cause or action was created, otherwise such a cause or action will be permanently concluded. The headings of the paragraphs in these TERMS are only present for the convenience of the parties and have no legal or contractual s significance. These terms and conditions form the entire agreement between you and OpinionBar with regards to what has been discussed here and replace any previous and current verbal or written agreements. You are not permitted to transfer this agreement to anyone else.

data.name: get_paid_msg
data.value: Choose to be paid or to support a charity of your choice

data.name: give_your_opinion_msg
data.value: Cast your opinion in our online surveys and help companies to improve their products

data.name: last_name_error_msg
data.value: The Last name field is required

data.name: limitation_ guarantees_msg
data.value: OpinionBar supplies the Research Panel, the services and all Evaluations "as is". Neither OpinionBar, nor its branch offices, suppliers, channel partners or clients will make explicit or implicit statements about the functioning of information that has been made available through or via the Research Panel, the services and evaluations. OpinionBar rejects any liability, either explicitly or implicitly, including but not limited to implicit guarantees of saleability, ownership, suitability for a certain purpose and non-infringement. Furthermore, OpinionBar does not guarantee that the use of the services will be uninterrupted, will always be available from all locations, is secure or free from bugs, that bugs will be dealt with or that the services are free of viruses or other damaging components.

data.name: limitation_liability_msg
data.value: In no event can OpinionBar, it's branch offices, suppliers, channel partners or clients be held responsible for any damage, including but not limited to direct, indirect and additional damage or consequential loss, either based on warranty, contract, illegal action or another legal theory and whether or not informed about the possibility of such damage. The total liability of OpinionBar, its branch offices, suppliers, channel partners or clients resulting from or with regards to this agreement (regardless of the type of action or claim, e.g. contract, warranty, illegal action, strict liability, negligence, misconduct, fraud or other legal propositions) is limited to 5000. In jurisdictions where the applicable law does not permit the exclusion or restriction of additional or consequential loss this exclusion and restriction is invalid.

data.value: You chose to pay your balance of

data.value: We will invite you for more surveys soon!

data.value: Please pay my balance of €10,00 to:

data.name: mp_payment_confirmmation
data.value: Your payment will be transferred to your acount in the first week of next month!

data.name: mp_profile_text
data.value: Completing the next profile survey "Survey name" will bring your profile completeness to 60%

data.name: m_abt_msg
data.value: We’re a leading global online testing community. We’re operated by MetrixLab, one of the world's fastest growing digital market research agencies..</br> We invite community members to participate in online surveys. They can do this from the comfort of their own home or from wherever they choose. And they get paid for taking the time to tell brands what they think..</br> We started in 1999 running surveys about websites. Today, our members number in the hundreds of thousands and are asked for their views on a wide range of subjects every month – including about websites, products, advertisements and services..</br>

data.name: opbar_fortune _companies_msg
data.value: We work together with Fortune 500 companies from all over the world.

data.name: opbar_make_your_voice_msg
data.value: With OpinionBar, millions of people express their opinion every year and tell the large organizations what they think of their products, services, websites and advertisement.

data.name: opbar_privacy_msg
data.value: OpinionBar values the privacy of your personal data. That's why surveys are anonymous, we never share personal data with third parties and your data is protected by SSL.

data.name: password_length_error_msg
data.value: The Password must be at least 6 characters

data.name: password_verifcation_error_msg
data.value: The password and confirmation password do not match.

data.name: privacy_ans1
data.value: The answers you give in our surveys, researches and on our website will be treated as anonymous, unless, and only unless, you have given your specific consent to the contrary. In the relatively few instances where we ask you for permission to pass data on in a form which allows you to be personally identified, we will ensure that the information will be used only for the purposes stated. We will not send you unsolicited commercial mail, nor pass on your email addresses to others for this purpose. However virtually all surveys are done anonymously: your name, address and email details are never passed onto other companies or persons. This applies to all participants in our surveys and researches and is also a legal requirement for each survey.

data.name: privacy_ans2
data.value: This privacy policy applies to all persons which participate or have participated in researches by OpinionBar/MetrixLab: 1. Participants which have registered through the OpinionBar.com signup form. 2. Participants which are recruited by an invitation on third party websites. 3. Participants which are invited through a CRM database delivered by the client. 4. Participants which have been recruited through people’s choice awards organized by OpinionBar. 5. Participants which have participated to surveys in any other form than listed above.

data.name: privacy_ans3
data.value: Information such as your name, address, ip-address, email address, payment information, telephone number and date of birth is classed as "recognisable personal information" because this information can be used to indirectly or directly to identify you. This information is protected by virtue of our privacy policy. We will never give, sell, rent out, or trade recognisable personal information to a third party or share this information with a third party.

data.name: privacy_ans4
data.value: Surveys are always anonymous: your name, address and email details are never passed on to other companies or persons. This applies to the participants in our researches and surveys and is legally required for each survey.</br> Information that can be traced back to a particular person will never be used for non-research purposes such as direct marketing, setting up address lists, credit rating, the collection of money or other marketing activities related to those individual respondents.</br> We perform our research with the greatest respect for your privacy. Under no circumstance will MetrixLab give, sell, rent out, or trade recognisable personal information about our members to a third party or share this information with a third party.

data.name: privacy_ans5
data.value: The OpinionBar website is protected against loss, misuse and editing of the information we manage. This includes measures such as firewalls, data scrambling, SSL encryption (RC4 128 Bits), application proxies, monitoring technology and adaptive analysis of network traffic to trace any abuse of our network and its data contents. The OpinionBar website and software communicate with our database using the SSL-protocol, thus ensuring third parties are not able to read or edit any data.

data.name: privacy_ans6
data.value: You can always visit our website and change your own profile. Please Note: You will be asked to give your email address and password if you wish to view, change or replace your profile.

data.name: privacy_ans7
data.value: You can terminate your membership via the Unsubscribe page (www.opinionbar.com/unsubscribe.aspx). You will be sent an email to confirm the cancellation of your account for security purposes.

data.name: privacy_ans8
data.value: If we decide to change our privacy policy we will publish these changes on our Homepage or send our users an email with the changes to ensure our users are always aware which information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances we may publish this information.

data.name: privacy_ans9
data.value: All research performed on the Internet is subject to the rules and initiatives of the leading ICC/ESOMAR International Code of Marketing and Social Research Practice (plus European Guideline for Data Protection and any other relevant national or international legislation).</br> Market research must always respect the rights of the respondents and other Internet users. It must be executed in a way that is acceptable to all those involved and the general public and it must comply with national and international self regulation. Researchers must avoid taking actions that may damage the reputation of or affect the trust people have in Internet research.</br> Visit www.esomar.org for more information on ESOMAR and the ICC/ESOMAR International Code of Marketing and Social Research Practice.</br> European Guideline for Data Protection The Guideline of the European Parliament and the EU Council with regards to the protection of individuals with regards to the processing of personal data and the free circulation thereof.

data.name: privacy_msg
data.value: OpinionBar is an initiative of the digital research agency MetrixLab. MetrixLab (OpinionBar) collects information for the sole purpose of market research..</br> Market research is the gathering and interpreting of information from consumers, companies and society. The intelligence collected is used by commissioning clients/companies to make smarter decisions with regards to marketing, product development and society. Your participation in the OpinionBar surveys helps companies to develop and improve websites, products and services..</br> We value your privacy and safeguard your personal data. That’s why all our surveys are anonymous. We never share personal data with third parties. And your data is protected by SSL, which provides secure communications over a computer network. requirement more about the type of collect.</br> We perform our research with the greatest respect for your privacy. Under no circumstance will we give, sell or rent recognizable information about our members to a third party. Neither will we trade or share such information with a third party..

data.value: How does OpinionBar treat my data?

data.value: To whom does this privacy statement apply to?

data.value: What type of information do we collect from participants?

data.name: privacy_qn7
data.value: How can you terminate your participation?

data.name: privacy_qn8
data.value: How do we inform you about changes in the privacy policy?

data.name: privacy_qn9
data.value: Organisations and regulations we conform to.

data.name: prohibited_list_1
data.value: Not to mail to third parties or to otherwise publicise information about surveys, including but not limited to the questions asked, your response to the questions, the nature of the survey or content in any surveys you participated, websites you have visited, or products you have tested during your participation in a survey. Copyright on all content, questions and answers belongs to OpinionBar.

data.name: prohibited_list_10
data.value: Not to use "auto-responders", "cancel-bots", or similar mechanisms that solely generate network traffic or disturb newsgroups or email.

data.name: prohibited_list_11
data.value: Never to send unsolicited emails or advertisements.

data.name: prohibited_list_12
data.value: Not to send false or misleading offers of products, business or services, or: Not to pass on unsolicited emails or advertisements using OpinionBar servers</br>

data.name: prohibited_list_13
data.value: Not to have third parties fill in your surveys for you

data.name: prohibited_list_14
data.value: Not to use software, or a mechanism that automatically generates answers in our surveys

data.name: prohibited_list_15
data.value: Not to reregister yourself to OpinionBar once your account is deleted due to an infringement of our Terms and Conditions

data.name: prohibited_list_2
data.value: Not to give misleading or false information during your registration or in your answers in a survey.

data.name: prohibited_list_3
data.value: Not to publicise misleading or false information regarding OpinionBar or its surveys.

data.name: prohibited_list_4
data.value: Not to encourage third parties to give OpinionBar incorrect or false information as part if the registration process.

data.name: prohibited_list_5
data.value: Not to demand rewards for surveys you have not completed in good faith.

data.name: prohibited_list_6
data.value: Not to use or send any material protected by copyright, trademark, trade secrecy, patent or other intellectual ownership rights without first gaining the appropriate authorisation.</br>

data.name: prohibited_list_7
data.value: Never to send an electronic transmission of a message subject, either partially or in its entirety, that originates from or runs through the Services.

data.name: prohibited_list_8
data.value: Never to threaten, pester, discredit, embarrass, or distress another person or group.

data.name: prohibited_list_9
data.value: Never to send any computer viruses, worms or other software with the intention of damaging or changing a computer system.

data.name: prohibited_use_msg
data.value: As a Panel Member you agree to only use the Services for legal purposes. The use of Services for or with regards to the sending, distribution,collection or saving of data or material that is against the law or any other regulations is prohibited. You also agree:</br>

data.name: resp_of_usr_msg
data.value: You agree to provide OpinionBar with correct and complete registration details and to always keep these details up to date. You agree not to register as a Panel Member under more than one name, never to take part in the same survey twice, transfer your credits to a bank account other than your own or obtain more than one password in any way. Should you fail to do this, you are in contravention of these TERMS.</br> You declare that you are not a partner, shareholder or employee of a company that offers software or services, including web-based or other technologies, to qualitatively or quantitatively conduct market research from the viewpoint of a customer, prospective customer, employee, transferee or other target audiences (an "OpinionBar competitor"). In addition you declare that you are not a member of the (international) Market Research Society.</br> By registering to become a Panel Member you will receive a username and a password. It is your responsibility to keep your account details and password safe. You may not inform others of your password. You are fully responsible for any activities executed via your account. You agree to inform OpinionBar immediately in the event of the unauthorised use of your account or any other infringement of security you are aware of or suspect.</br> To be able to participate in some website surveys, you must download the OpinionBar software available on our website. You agree that the Opinion software is supplied to you AS IS and that OpinionBar has no responsibility for the fact that you have downloaded or are using the software.</br> OpinionBar can send you, as a member of the Research Panel, an invitation via email (an "invitation") to take part in one or more surveys. If you decide to take part in a survey, you must do your utmost to complete it as well as possible. OpinionBar will view your results to ensure you have completed the survey and have answered the questions in a manner that OpinionBar deems satisfactory. If OpinionBar includes your answers in the gathered results that will be given to the client who has purchased the survey, OpinionBar will give you the reward that was offered to you in the Invitation. However, if OpinionBar does not include your answers in the gathered results that will be given to the client because we have determined that these were not satisfactory; you will not receive the reward or the received reward will be claimed back.</br>

data.name: safeguarding_msg
data.value: You agree to safeguard OpinionBar, its branch offices, suppliers, channel partners and clients against any claims and demands, including legal fees, by third parties as the result of the use of your account, any contents you may post, mail, send or transfer in your capacity as Panel Member, your breach of the TERMS or your infringement of the rights of any third party.

data.name: signup_free_msg
data.value: Create your free OpinionBar account today and join our online community

data.name: srvy_shd_fun
data.value: We believe surveys should be fun!

data.name: srvy_shd_fun_msg
data.value: As a member of our community, you’ll be invited to participate in all kinds of surveys. We believe these should be as interesting and/or fun for you to complete as possible. After all, if you enjoy completing them, we achieve better response rates and higher quality data. For this reason, we often use game-like and fun exercises to determine what members really think about websites or advertisements, for example You’ll also have the opportunity to test products at home (and to keep them most of the time)..

data.name: sys&nwrk_sec_msg
data.value: Violations of the system or network security of the Services or of a website you are visiting d uring a survey are prohibited and may make you become subject to criminal or civil law. OpinionBar will investigate any breaches of security and may inform the relevant police services if any violations are suspected. You are not permitted to evade authentications or the security of hosts, networks, network components or accounts to gain access to data, accounts or systems for which you have not received express permission. You are not permitted to hinder or attempt to hinder other Internet users, hosts, systems or networks unless you have received express permission to do so.

data.name: t&c_msg
data.value: OpinionBar carries out surveys using the members of the OpinionBar Research Panel (the "Research Panel"). The terms, conditions and guidelines that are tied to becoming a member of the Research Panel and the use of the OpinionBar Services, the OpinionBar Software and the related services (the "Services") that are made available to the members of the Research Panel ("Panel Members") are stated in these terms for participation in the OpinionBar Research Panel. ("TERMS").</br> By participating in an OpinionBar market research survey you agree to comply with the terms, conditions and guidelines outlined in these TERMS.</br> Please note that OpinionBar may change these TERMS at any time without notice and that such changes come into effect on the date that such changed TERMS are made available on the OpinionBar website at http://www.OpinionBar.com. Your participation in a survey after such changes have come into effect means you accept all changes.</br> Participation in surveys and membership to OpinionBar is free and open to everyone aged 14 or older who agrees to our TERMS.</br>

data.name: termination_msg
data.value: You may terminate your account any time by visiting your account termination page or send a letter with your name, address, date of birth, email address and signature to: MetrixLab B.V., Wilhelminakade 312, 3072 AR, Rotterdam, The Netherlands. The termination of your account will occur within a reasonable time after OpinionBar has received your notice of termination.</br> OpinionBar reserves the right to restrict the Services to users and from time to time and according to its own judgement with or without announcement and with or without reasons immediately deny access to the Services and can remove all account details, credits, and other content.</br> You or OpinionBar may terminate the account at any time. This is your only and exclusive means of dealing with any dissatisfaction about the Services, terms and conditions in the TERMS, which may be changed from time to time, or other policies and practices OpinionBar may adjust or change.

data.name: we_thn-rewd
data.value: We think you should be rewarded!

data.name: we_thn-rewd_msg
data.value: We will credit your account between €1.00 and €10.00 for each survey you complete. You can request a payment once your balance has reached the minimum threshold of €10.00 . You can choose to receive the money yourself or donate it to one of the charities supported by OpinionBar. Unlike other online survey communities, we reward you with money, not vouchers. It is your money and so you should be free to spend it however you choose..
